page.title: 02TREVITHICK DAY
page.content: {TREVITHICK DAY} People dance through the main street in the town with their school or dancing classes. In the main street there are lots of stalls. In a car park they had lots of vintage cars on show, some of them dating back before the Second World War. {RICHARD TREVITHICK} Outside our library there is a statue of Richard Trevithick who invented the first locomotive in 1803-4. It was the first locomotive to haul a load on rails. Richard Trevithick was born in 1771 and died in 1833, so he was 62 when he died.Richard Trevithick was the first person to invent steam locomotives.
